website_summaries.verdict: Has a good range, and the battery-powered receiver makes this option very portable.
pros: Set includes a transmitter, button and 2 receivers, one of the receivers is battery-powered
Features 36 chimes and 4 adjustable volume levels
Comes with batteries for both the transmitter and receiver
cons: Double-sided tape to mount the transmitter does not stick well to some surfaces such as brick

customer_reviews.title: YES! A WINNER
customer_reviews.text: So simple. So perfect. Good range on the movable unit. We leave it on the back porch or take it out to the workshop. It's working through brick walls at a range of about 75 feet from the door. The volume is loud enough for our old, worn out ears. Better than expected!
customer_reviews.author: Make Do

customer_reviews.title: Loud door Bell
customer_reviews.text: Finally a door bell that I can hear! And I like the fact it has two inside receivers...I have one in the kitchen and another in a far bedroom. I've only had it a few months, but so far it deserves a 5 star rating!
customer_reviews.author: A. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great doorbell for the price. The range is good and the voulume is loud that you may not need both receivers. I live in Trinidad and when it rains it rains and it's still working. Purchased in October and I had plenty rains. So it's safe to Say it's weather proof
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice purchase- little money
customer_reviews.text: My mother loves this. It is loud, clear, and fun!!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan H.

customer_reviews.title: Highly satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and install. Very good device, would recomend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Turtle42

customer_reviews.title: This is a good one!
customer_reviews.text: At last you can hear the doorbell in the back room. This is a good one!
customer_reviews.author: katherine

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product is working fine, However, double-sided tape does not stick to brick.
customer_reviews.author: John M.

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Had tried others that didn't come close to ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Had tried others that didn't come close to working at the specified distances.
customer_reviews.author: GWR1760

customer_reviews.title: cheap plastic
customer_reviews.text: nice music, but the back of the bell holder doesn't hold the bell.
customer_reviews.author: linda bretz

customer_reviews.title: My kids love how many Christmas songs it has
customer_reviews.text: I previously purchase a wireless doorbell but you had to use electricity. I wanted something that would raise my electric bill and I found this gem. It works very well. My kids love how many Christmas songs it has. Very pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Wireless Doorbell, AVANTEK Waterproof Chime Kit, Operating at 300 Meters, 2 Plug-in Receivers, 36 Melodies to Choose From, 4 Volume Levels, Black (DB-12W1)
product_meta.description:
The AVANTEK Wireless Doorbell Kit can be conveniently used by households, businesses, and commercial and nursing facilities. It comes with one transmitter, one plug-in receiver and one battery-operated receiver. The battery-operated receiver is portable so that you can easily take it with you anywhere you go in your house or yard.

Brings a Taste of Exoticism in Life

The doorbell kit comes with a list of 36 famous melodies from around the world, including “Jingle Bells” “Moscow Nights” “For Elise” “Jasmine Flower” and many more. Ranging from exotic to classic, the list of tunes ensures that you will never get bored with your doorbell again.

Great Doorbell Kit for Every House

Each doorbell kit is set with a unique frequency code, so you won't be annoyed by any mistaken rings due to interference with other devices or from neighbors. What’s more, up to a 300 m / 1000 ft wireless operation distance with a very strong signal will make you never miss important visitors or urgent deliveries, whether you are working in the garage or relaxing on the patio.

More Than a Useful Doorbell

Apart from its traditional use as a doorbell, it can also function as an in-home paging device. It can easily be used for emergency alerts by the elderly, allowing them to summon help with the press of a button.

Package Contents

1 × Transmitter (battery included)
1 × Plug-in receiver
1 × Battery operated receiver
3 × AAA battery
1 × Adhesive tape
2 × Screw
1 × User manual
feature_bullets: PORTABLE DOORBELL: Includes 1 transmitter, 1 plug-in receiver and 1 battery-operated receiver; the battery-operated one is so portable that you can take it anywhere in your house or yard
SUPER LONG WORKING DISTANCE: Supports up to a 300 m / 1000 ft operating range; makes sure that you never miss a visitor or delivery again, whether you are occupied in the kitchen or the garden
STRONG ANTI-INTERFERENCE: One code for one kit system ensures no interference with other equipment or from neighbors; no more annoyance of responding to other people’s doorbells
WATER-RESISTANT TRANSMITTER: Withstands most weather conditions with an ingress protection grade of IP44; consumes very little energy and gives you years of dependable performance

BROAD USAGE: 36 various ringtones with 4 adjustable volume levels; ideal for homes, office buildings, hotels, factories etc.; it can also serve as a paging device, which is especially useful as an in-home emergency alert for the elderly

specifications.Style: White 1 Transmitter + 1 Plug-in Receiver + 1 Battery Operated Receiver
specifications.Special Features: Features flashing LED alerts, Preserves your last set melody and volume level after a power outage, The battery-operated receiver is portable to be taken anywhere, 36 optional melodies with 4 adjustable volume levels, Provides a massive 1000 ft wireless distance range, Working temperature ranges from -4 °F-140 °F
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars18 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
